song.title: Mighty to Save
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .C G Em7 D
[1] .C G Everyone needs compassion . Em7 A Love thats never failing . D Let mercy fall on me || .C G Everyone needs forgiveness . Em7 The kindness of a savior . D C D C D The hope of nations
[C] .G D Savior, He can move the mountains . Em7 C My God is mighty to save . Em7 D He is mighty to save || . G D Forever, author of salvation . Em7 C He rose and conquered the grave . Em7 D Jesus conquered the grave --- [2] .C G So take me as You find me . Em7 All my fears and failures . D And fill my life again || .C G I give my life to follow . Em7 Everything I believe in . D C D C D Now I surrender
[B] .C G Shine Your light and . D Em7 Let the whole world see singing .C G D Em7 For the glory of the risen King, Jesus
